content.body: If we seriously have extra time on the agenda, there are a couple wild open discussion topics which might be fun. Emoji-react something if you're interested in them. (Apologies for not raising this before the agenda deadline.)
Private name declarations outside of classes

> <@littledan:matrix.org> Cancellable promises

Would it make sense to discuss this on https://github.com/tc39/proposal-cancellation?
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @littledan:matrix.org
